Desc.entry: Provides osteopathy for adults, mums-to-be, babies and children to provide relief from a wide range of conditions including back and neck pain, headaches and pregnancy-related conditions. Also provides cranial osteopathy for a range of childhood conditions. Initial baby treatments, up to a year old, are free of charge. (Parents are invited to make a donation to the Sheffield Children's Hospital if they would like to.) Westfield, HAS, AXA/PPP healthcare and BUPA registered.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon, Wed, Thurs & Fri 9am-6pm; Tues pm

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon, Wed, Thurs & Fri 9am-6pm; Tues pm
